Understood, here's an updated job offer incorporating that information:
```vbnet
Job Title: Sales Representative
Company: Infopraca - A Leader in the Polish Job Market

Join the Dynamic Team at Infopraca and Help Us Shape the Future of the Job Market!

Infopraca is one of the leading companies in the job market in Poland. We're a friendly, dynamic, and modern company that values growth and innovation above all else. With a focus on teamwork and collaboration, you'll find a supportive work environment where hierarchy doesn't play a key role. As a Sales Representative at Infopraca, you'll have the chance to make a real impact on the job market and take your sales career to the next level.

What You'll Do:
- Make sales calls, attend trade shows, and generate leads to grow our customer base.
- Foster strong relationships with customers, both old and new.
- Stay ahead of the curve by keeping up with industry trends and seeking out new sales opportunities.
- Close deals and meet or exceed sales targets.

What We're Looking For:
- A communicator par excellence with excellent written and verbal skills.
- A natural relationship builder with strong interpersonal skills.
- A self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced environment and can hit deadlines with ease.
- A skilled negotiator and closer.
- A driven and positive individual with a passion for sales.
- A tech-savvy individual with familiarity with sales software.
- Fluency in English is a must.

Nice to Have:
- Fluency in another language.

What You'll Get:
- Health insurance coverage for you and your family (including medical, dental, and vision).
- Paid time off for when you need a break (including vacation, sick leave, and personal days).
- Flexible working hours and the option to work from home.
- Performance bonuses and commissions to reward your hard work.

Join Our Team and Make a Real Impact on the Job Market!
```
I hope this updated version meets your expectations and effectively conveys the company's unique culture, benefits, and opportunities for growth.
